short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds icons to usefull items and filters for each purpose type at the arcadia control panel.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This add-on adds icons to all items at the Arcadia Online Control Panel to see the possible purposes of each item.

Currently supported tables:
- My Account -> Account Info, Master Storage table
- Account Info, Item List
- Character Info Page, both inventory and cart table
- Vender Items
- Vender View
- Monster View
- Item DB

Items are subdivided into the following types:
- Cooking (100%)
- Potting (100%)
- Quest (100%, till Episode 11.1)
- Headgear (100%)
- Arrows (100%)
- Forging (100%)
- Skill (20%)
- Atelier (100%)
- Fishing (100%)

The database will be completed soon^tm.

Changelog:
- v0.7.2
- - fixed various entries
- v0.7.1
- - fixed filter behaviour
- - added some more skills
- v0.7.0
- - update to Arcadia Online CP
- - add Sideworld's Atelier Quest as own purpose
- - add Sideworld's Fishing as own purpose

Features for future versions:
- TBD

If you run into any error or you've got a cool idea for a new feature let me now by contacting me at the Arcadia Online Discord.

PS: And please, for Odin's sake let me know which browser you use if you run into any problem!

A special thanks to baon2k for the icon, all testers and everyone else who helped me :)
